general_provisions: This bill addresses the trafficking of certain controlled substances.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>creates a criminal offense of trafficking of fentanyl or a fentanyl-related substance; and<hr><ltbullet>makes conforming and technical changes.
